text:
Hey everyone,

Just following up on my previous post regarding the issue with tracking Google and Facebook leads after the recent API shift. We haven't received any feedback yet and would really appreciate your insights or suggestions on how to resolve this. Has anyone else faced similar issues or found a workaround?

Also, is there a *Discord* community for HubSpot? If so, please let us know.

Thanks in advance for your help!

Hello
please let me know where do i get these 4 functions in HubSpot? and can we perform these function through external extension?
• Screen pop
• click to dial
• no match, multimatch and single match
• activity creation
u have to define properties, which u want to got
because 2 of your variables are read only. hs_lastmodifieddate etc
100 i think
Hey <@U07RFG59F19>, if I'm understanding correctly, that would mean getting a response with 23 instead of 25 values, not just 13, correct?
and thanks for replying, much appreciated :smile:!
Hey everyone, Is their any way to join the data we are receiving from the HubSpot api.
Ok but why would it come back with 0 results? Then I try to create a contact with that email address that comes back 0 results and it says 409 contact exists
<@U038DUUV3GE> your<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/files/U038DUUV3GE/F07RTQY0E75/image.png| screenshot> shows that you are using the Companies Search endpoint. Is that intended?
which language u make this? i will try it at my nodejs app

in nodejs
this is my request with all possible properties.

`const deal = await HubSpotClient.crm.deals.basicApi.getById(dealId, ["amount","amount_in_home_currency","closed_lost_reason","closed_won_reason","closedate","createdate","days_to_close","deal_currency_code","dealname","dealstage","dealtype","description","engagements_last_meeting_booked","engagements_last_meeting_booked_campaign","engagements_last_meeting_booked_medium","engagements_last_meeting_booked_source","hs_acv","hs_all_accessible_team_ids","hs_all_assigned_business_unit_ids","hs_all_collaborator_owner_ids","hs_all_deal_split_owner_ids","hs_all_owner_ids","hs_all_team_ids","hs_analytics_latest_source","hs_analytics_latest_source_company","hs_analytics_latest_source_contact","hs_analytics_latest_source_data_1","hs_analytics_latest_source_data_1_company","hs_analytics_latest_source_data_1_contact","hs_analytics_latest_source_data_2","hs_analytics_latest_source_data_2_company","hs_analytics_latest_source_data_2_contact","hs_analytics_latest_source_timestamp","hs_analytics_latest_source_timestamp_company","hs_analytics_latest_source_timestamp_contact","hs_analytics_source","hs_analytics_source_data_1","hs_analytics_source_data_2","hs_arr","hs_campaign","hs_closed_amount","hs_closed_amount_in_home_currency","hs_closed_deal_close_date","hs_closed_deal_create_date","hs_closed_won_count","hs_closed_won_date","hs_created_by_user_id","hs_createdate","hs_date_entered_appointmentscheduled","hs_date_entered_closedlost","hs_date_entered_closedwon","hs_date_entered_contractsent","hs_date_entered_decisionmakerboughtin","hs_date_entered_presentationscheduled","hs_date_entered_qualifiedtobuy","hs_date_exited_appointmentscheduled","hs_date_exited_closedlost","hs_date_exited_closedwon","hs_date_exited_contractsent","hs_date_exited_decisionmakerboughtin","hs_date_exited_presentationscheduled","hs_date_exited_qualifiedtobuy","hs_days_to_close_raw","hs_deal_amount_calculation_preference","hs_deal_score","hs_deal_stage_probability","hs_deal_stage_probability_shadow","hs_exchange_rate","hs_forecast_amount","hs_forecast_probability","hs_has_empty_cond     `, undefined, ['quotes', 'line_items', 'contacts']);`
this is working and sending all properties i selected. can u check this
what do you mean with "join"
Ok cool, thank you
Hi! Since the public automation API is still in beta development, there might be a few bugs here and there. Could you dm me the `correlationId` for the error message?

*Feedback/Survey API*

Hello Community!  :5065-hello:

I am a Product Manager at HubSpot and looking for Feedback API use cases.  Anyone here interested in sharing your challenges with the current Feedback API in Beta and/or provide insights on how you would like to use Feedback as part of your solutions?  If so, please <https://meetings.HubSpot.com/byung|schedule some time with meet to chat>!
yeah i siwtched it to contact still coming back with 0 results
i found out the problem , it is not a primary email
how can you include "additional emails" in the search endpoint?
anything in additional emails does not show up in the contact search endpoint :disappointed: if you are searching by email EQ
but if you try to create a contact with that email address via the API it says 409 contact exists

^^

Anyone know of a way to include a contact's "additional emails" to be accounted for in the contact/search api (when searching by email) in particular when you search for a contact's additional email?

<@U038DUUV3GE> you could use the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/api/crm/objects/contacts#get-%2Fcrm%2Fv3%2Fobjects%2Fcontacts%2F%7Bcontactid%7D|"Read a Contact" endpoint with idProperty=email>
```E.g. GET <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/contacts/><primary-or-additional-email-in-system>?idProperty=email```
